title: 我的第二篇文章
content:
我想测试一下

#import "SMSTempletCell.h"

@interface SMSTempletCell(){

    __weak IBOutlet UILabel *message;
    __weak IBOutlet UIButton *deleteButton;
}

@end

@implementation SMSTempletCell

- (instancetype)initWithStyle:(UITableViewCellStyle)style reuseIdentifier:(NSString *)reuseIdentifier{
    self = [super initWithStyle:style reuseIdentifier:reuseIdentifier];
    if (self) {
       self = LoadNibWithName([[SMSTempletCell class] description]);
    }
    return self;
}


- (IBAction)deleteAction:(id)sender {
    if ([self.delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(SMSTempletCell:deleteButtonClicked:)]) {
        [self.delegate SMSTempletCell:self deleteButtonClicked:sender];
    }
}

- (void)fillMessage:(NSString*)msg cellIndex:(NSInteger)index{
    message.text = msg;
    deleteButton.tag = index;
}
@end

你好啊

这是一个测试

asdf 

Installing SCCUtil (0.3.4)
Installing SCCWebView (1.1.0)
Installing SCCWechat (1.7.4.1)
Installing SDAutoLayout (2.1.7)
Installing SDCycleScrollView (1.64)
Installing SDWebImage (3.7.6)
Installing SVProgressHUD (2.1.2)
Installing UICountingLabel (1.2.0)
Installing UITableView+FDTemplateLayoutCell (1.5.beta)
Installing UIView+FDCollapsibleConstraints (1.1)
Installing UMengAnalytics-NO-IDFA (4.1.1)
Installing UMengSocialCOM (5.2.1)
Installing YYModel (1.0.4)
Installing ZipArchive (1.4.0)
Installing cheniu_share (0.6.2)
Installing dfc_chooseLocation (0.3.3)
Installing libextobjc (0.4.1)

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
